item.text: <textHeader>WHAT IS IT?</textHeader> <textBody>The Creative Toolkit contains all approved creative assets that can be utilized to support Coca-Cola 600 NASCAR and other races throughout the 2012 season</textBody> <textHeader>OBJECTIVE</textHeader> <textBody>Creative assets developed to generate Brand awareness and drive volume for NASCAR events</textBody> <textHeader>MEDIUMS</textHeader> <textBody>Program Ads TV ads Radio ads Radio Scripts (English/Spanish) TV Sponsorship Billboards </textBody>

WHAT IS IT? Trademark enhancement is best in class activation of our assets with sustaining communication that enhances our trademark in order to maximize our investment and drive business results / In-Venue Zone Strategy / MAA Guiding Principles / MAA Implementation Tools / Customer Sales Aid OBJECTIVE Creative customized elements utilizing pre-approved templates facilitate asset activation in-venue ACTIVATION ZONES Zone 1 – Concession Zone 2 – Track & Concourse Zone 3 – Entrance/Parking Lot

<textHeader>BRAND GUIDELINES</textHeader> <textBody>Priority Sparkling*: 1) Coca-Cola 2) Coke Zero 3) Sprite 4) Diet Coke
Priority Still*: 1) Dasani 2) PowerAde ion 4 3) NOS 4) vitaminwater </textBody> <textNote>* These priorities should be followed when activating sustaining elements. All appropriate promotional brands should be used to support national program efforts.</textNote>

ORDERING Template access via Design Machine: / Website / User Guide Sizes currently available:
  • 8.5” x 11”
  • 5.5” x 8.5”
  • 7” x 10”

CUSTOMIZATION If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> These TV ads can be used to run during live games or when broadcast on individual stations and can be used until creative changes. These ads can also run in non-broadcast venues (In-Venue, In-Store, In-Restaurant, Kiosks, Tradeshows, In-Flight, Cinema, Internal/External meetings) and Internet.
ORDERING Submit orders for TV spots / Broadcast Use / Non-Broadcast Use / Internet Use Limited to 1 copy of each spot per location.

<textHeader>LEGAL NOTICE</textHeader> By requesting delivery of this spot, you acknowledge that your department is fully responsible for any talent fees, licensing fees, or other charges incurred as a result of any use outside the permitted scope or time period set forth here.
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> These Radio Ads are approved for broadcast, non-broadcast/industrial, and internet/streaming use. Rotation should be equal depending on number of spots chosen to run.

ORDERING Submit orders for Radio spots: / Radio - Individual Stations (broadcast from individual stations) / Radio - Network (broadcast from single location to multiple stations) / Radio - Non-Broadcast Use (for non-broadcast only - (In-Venue, In-Store, Internal/External meetings, Tradeshows) / Radio - Internet Use (internet/streaming)

<textHeader>LEGAL NOTICE</textHeader> By requesting delivery of this spot, you acknowledge that your department is fully responsible for any talent fees, licensing fees, or other charges incurred as a result of any use outside the permitted scope or time period set forth here.

AVO: NASCAR drivers train like crazy to prepare them for race day -- the pressure, the heat, the g forces. But what about NASCAR fans? How will you get through those hairpin turns and screaming straightaways? Lucky for you there’s refreshing ice-cold Coca-Cola. So stop by {{[RETAILER]}} and pick some up. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

AVO: Ever been to a NASCAR race? Those engines really scream. Then again, as a NASCAR fan, you probably scream, too. Even just sitting at your TV. So before the race, make sure you’re at peak performance and stop by {{[RETAILER]}} for plenty of refreshing ice-cold Coca-Cola. Pop the top and enjoy the race. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

How will you get through those hairpin turns and screaming straightaways? Lucky for you there’s refreshing ice-cold Coca-Cola. So stop by {{[RETAILER]}} and pick up a {{[PACKAGE]}}. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

So before the race, make sure you’re at peak performance and stop by your nearest store and pick up plenty of refreshing ice-cold Coca-Cola. Pop the top and enjoy the race. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

AVO: Temperatures in a NASCAR driver’s cockpit can reach upwards of 120 degrees. Thirsty business to be sure. And while temperatures in a NASCAR fan’s living room rarely exceed 75 degrees, emotions can run even hotter than a redlining engine. Equally thirsty business. So stop by {{[RETAILER]}} so you can have plenty of refreshing ice-cold Coca-Cola on hand. And come race day, make sure you reach for it. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

AVO: Temperatures in a NASCAR driver’s car can reach 120 degrees. Temperatures in a NASCAR fan’s living room rarely go above 75, but emotions can run even hotter. So pick up plenty of refreshing Coca-Cola at {{[RETAILER]}}. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

AVO: When it comes to NASCAR, happiness is opening up your 750 horsepower engine full-throttle as you fly down a straightaway. A moment so great that just watching it delivers an adrenalin surge. Coca-Cola reminds you that in moments like this, grabbing a refreshing ice-cold Coke is just the thing to get peak performance from your experience as a NASCAR fan. So stop by {{[RETAILER]}} and pick some up. Coca-Cola. Open Happiness.

AVO: Happiness is opening up a 750 horsepower NASCAR engine down a straightaway. Or even just watching it. Especially with a refreshing Coca-Cola in your hand. So stop by {{[RETAILER]}} and pick some up. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

AVO: Screaming engines. Screaming fans. NASCAR is everything racing should be. Brought to you by ice-cold refreshing Coca-Cola. Open happiness.
AVO: NASCAR is everything racing should be. Brought to you by Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

<textHeader> TRAFFIC INSTRUCTIONS</textHeader> <textBody> Please use templates provided by The Coca-Cola Company. Any revisions made to the provided scripts, other than where indicated by [BRACKETS], must be submitted for approval. </textBody>

ORDERING Template access via Design Machine: / Website / User Guide Sizes currently available:
  • 14" x 48"
  • 30-sheet
  • Vertical Kiosk

CUSTOMIZATION If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

ORDERING/CUSTOMIZATION Creative available via Finished Art. Sizes currently available:
  • 1296x648
  • 1400x400
  • 1080x920
    • If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: The Howard Company / Website / Contact via Email to Order Weaver Media / Website / Contact via Email to Order For additional information on the suppliers, click the SUPPLIERS tab.

THE HOWARD COMPANY / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 6 main menu boards (sizes & types) and illuminated boards along with numerous specialty/custom boards for unique applications and locations. Variations include: with/without panel header, with/without acrylic cover, with digital LCD display
  • All menu boards use the same size strips and numbers although colors and font styles can be changed. Menu items and numbers are all separate
  • Magnets can be ordered online. All strips and numbers are direct printed on magnetic material
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as banners and adhesive graphics (floor and wall)
    •  WEAVER MEDIA / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 10 main menu boards including illuminated boards
  • All menu boards use magnetic strips (one strip that included menu items and prices)
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as adhesive graphics (floor and wall), concession stand graphics, banners
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine / Website
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine / Website
CREW UNIFORMS To order: Summit / Website First time users must register. Type "NASCAR" in the search box to find the items shown here.
HAWKING TRAYS To order: Summit / Website First time users must register. Type "NASCAR" in the search box to find the items shown here.
